participant_1.background:
One of my hobbies is to help people feel their best by dressing them up.
I enjoy walking and hiking as my favorite sports because they are both low-impact and can be done in a variety of settings.
I plan to relax on the weekend and not think too much.
i am a guitar player.
i don t have a relationship with my deadbeat dad.

participant_2.background:
I went to the beach with my family and boyfriend last summer.
I'll be running around town to get inspiration for my next mural.
i have six brothers.
i am tall.
I enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts.

content.text: Hey, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm going to be running around town to get inspiration for my next mural. What about you?
I'm planning on relaxing and not thinking too much. I have a couple of concerts lined up that I'm really looking forward to.
That sounds nice. I need to take a break from work soon. It's been so busy lately.
I know what you mean. I work in retail and the holidays are always so hectic.
I'm an artist, so I'm always working on something. I don't really mind it, but it can be a lot of work sometimes.
I'm impressed. I wish I had artistic talent.
Thanks! It's something that I've always enjoyed doing.
I have a few friends who are artists. I love seeing their work.
I'm glad you're supportive of them. It's always nice to have people who appreciate your work.
Yeah, they're really talented. I hope they keep doing what they're doing.
Me too. They're both really passionate about their work.
That's great. I'm glad that they have something that they're passionate about.
Yeah, it's really important to have something that you love to do.
I agree. It makes life so much more enjoyable
